detectors.description:
PEARSWAP.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PEARSWAP.sol#252-257) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PEARSWAP.sol#254)
detectors.markdown:
